title: Gamecube Facts
author: CrispyShroom
pages:
The following are
some facts regarding
one of the best
Nintendo consoles of
all time.

The Gamecube.






Fact #1

The codename for the
Gamecube was
originally Shitty
McCubeface. But this
was deemed
inappropriate and was
changed to Dolphin.




Fact #2

Due to the low sales
of the Gamecube,
Nintendo was forced
to license Mario to
third-party games
such NBA Streetz
Volume 3.




Fact #3

The Gamecube is no
cube. Gamecube is
rectangular prism.








Fact #4

There was once a
Gamecube controller
with a built in
keyboard.







Fact #5
The Gamecube has an
adapter allowing
Gameboy games to be
played on the system.

The tragedy about
this fact is that mine
stopped working.

:(


Fact #6

Did you know that
RTGame is short for
RTGamecube?








Fact #7

The Gamecube has two
alternative bootup
screens that show up
depending on what
buttons you hold
during the bootup.





Fact #8

Peepee poopoo










Fact #9

The reason why
Gamecube discs are
so small was because
Nintendo wanted to
discourage piracy on
their consoles.

Oops, Dolphin Emulator



Fact #10

The Gamecube has
arguably the best
line-up of first-party
and third-party game.

See board that lists
my favorite Gamecube
games.
